Finance manager and business analyst with experience leading budgeting, analytics, reporting systems, and process improvements across multiple industries. Strong at partnering with product and operations teams to turn data into decisions.





Astana, Kazakhstan Â· Feb 2022 â€“ Aug 2024 - Led day-to-day financial operations and developed reporting systems. - Drove budgeting/forecasting and supported analytical & management reporting. - Performed regular and ad-hoc analysis of company and product performance. - Designed complex financial models for product decisions.



Astana, Kazakhstan Â· Apr 2021 â€“ Feb 2022 - Managed 8 subsidiary companies (logistics, copper scrap processing, ore mining & processing, airline/rail ticket sales). - Prepared annual/current financial budgets and controlled execution. - Conducted financial/economic analysis to improve management processes and business performance.



Astana, Kazakhstan Â· Jan 2019 â€“ Apr 2021 - Provided audit consulting on financial reporting for local and international clients. - Maintained effective communication with clients and team members.
